column6: "Contagion, Part One: This Little Curiosity," PART 2 OF 6 It's cover-to-cover blood-soaked action as the most extreme Wolverine monthly ever continues!  Wolverine has never faced an opponent quite like Contagion, who becomes a much bigger problem if he's killed!  But first, Logan must get past the aptly named Unkillables.  Round one: Madcap. Whatever you do, don't look into his eyes.
